item.description:
It's Saturday night in Boston! Don't stay in with your cat and watch Lord of the Rings...Come out and mingle! (Frodo gets the ring the to Mordor, sorry).

 

Get out and make some new friends! No age limits, no rules, just chill.

 

Howl at the Moon is always fun and everyone had a blast last time. The music is the best and we always have a good time (you can make your own dance circles and jam to Bon Jovi, Elton John and every single other artist you've ever loved).

Cover: The cover stars at 6PM and it's 10 dollars. I'm getting there around 5:15ish

Line: The line forms very quickly and goes around the block. I recommend getting there early and having a drink till the show stars.

Dating: This is not a singles event. It is a fun, summertime event.

Texting Me: A lot of you have my number by now, please do not text me to ask if people are there yet.

Website: Please visit Howl at the Moon's website to see what it's all about.

Location: Generally, we try to occupy the left corner of the bar. When you walk in, just head to the left by the windows.

Changes: Please check this right before you leave the house. I might have to move the venue the day of if they inform me that the place has been rented or something (as of right now, it's on).

Posting: Copy this, create an event, and post this on your FB page. Invite your friends. The more the merrier!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the bar, go to the left corner by the windows
item.name: Saturday Night Social: Live Music and Dancing
